description: Cryptocurrency exchange Gemini is warning it suffered a data breach incident caused by a cyberattack at its Automated Clearing House (ACH) service provider, whose name was not disclosed. [...]
title: Crypto exchange Gemini discloses third-party data breach

description: Google has fixed a bug in Chrome's Password Manager that caused user credentials to disappear temporarily for more than 18 hours. [...]
title: Google fixes Chrome Password Manager bug that hides credentials

description: Debt collection agency Financial Business and Consumer Solutions (FBCS) has again increased the number of people impacted by a February data breach, now saying it affects 4.2 million people in the US. [...]
title: FBCS data breach impact now reaches 4.2 million people

description: Microsoft has confirmed that July's security updates break remote desktop connections in organizations where Windows servers are configured to use the legacy RPC over HTTP protocol in the Remote Desktop Gateway. [...]
title: July Windows Server updates break Remote Desktop connections

description: ​Acronis warned customers to patch a critical Cyber Infrastructure security flaw that lets attackers bypass authentication on vulnerable servers using default credentials. [...]
title: Acronis warns of Cyber Infrastructure default password abused in attacks

description: Russian-speaking threat actors accounted for at least 69% of all crypto proceeds linked to ransomware throughout the previous year, exceeding $500,000,000. [...]
title: Russian ransomware gangs account for 69% of all ransom proceeds
